Body: I set up my device quite some time ago and created a Google account. Since then, I haven't had to use my password even once because my device is linked to the account.The problem is, now I would like to sign into my Google account online and I can't because I have absolutely no clue what my password is. Is there any way I can recover or even change my password from my phone?I understand the need for privacy but I really have no need for that kind of protection.
Title: What is my Google password?

history.Text: I set up my device quite some time ago and created a Google account. Since then, I haven't had to use my password even once because my device is linked to the account.The problem is, now I would like to sign into my Google account online and I can't because I have absolutely no clue what my password is. Is there any way I can recover or even change my password from my phone?I understand the need for privacy but I really have no need for that kind of protection.
